name: Lily
description:
A girl awakes in this strange forest, who dosen't know anything about it, then to survive she needs to fight, help her in this crazy adventure.

-- Controls --

Use the arrow keys to walk

Use Z to interact

Use X to cancel some interactions in the battle

-- Credits --
